description: Developed and implemented a platform to streamline operations, improving scheduling, resource management, and client booking visibility while reducing manual workload by 25%.
Analysed client data and behaviour patterns to produce insights that supported marketing and sales teams in targeting campaigns and boosting engagement.
Collaborated with offshore development teams and local stakeholders to ensure technical solutions were aligned with business needs and timelines.
Translated requirements into Product Requirement Documents (PRDs) and user stories, maintaining a prioritised backlog to guide development.
Facilitated Agile ceremonies (sprint planning, reviews, retrospectives), helping embed more structured delivery processes across the company.
Applied MoSCoW prioritisation to manage feature delivery and balance business demands with available resources.
Used the Eisenhower Matrix to help stakeholders distinguish between urgent issues and strategically important initiatives.
Acted as a bridge between technical and non-technical teams, ensuring smooth communication and alignment across functions and time zones.
Supported Product Managers on GRC/CRM initiatives by contributing to Product Requirement Documents (PRDs), epics, and user stories.
Gathered and translated stakeholder requirements via interviews and working sessions, ensuring development clarity.
Built Power BI dashboards for pipeline and usage tracking, enabling data-driven decisions and supporting a ~7% uplift in sales conversion.
Coordinated UAT and QA activities, triaging issues with QA leads and developers, contributing to a ~18% reduction in post-release defects.
Facilitated Agile rituals (stand-ups, backlog refinement, sprint retrospectives) by preparing boards, documenting actions, and ensuring visibility on status and blockers.
Applied MoSCoW prioritisation to balance quick wins with longer-term roadmap items; supported stakeholder trade-offs using the Eisenhower Matrix.
Collaborated with Compliance on data privacy and permission requirements for enterprise customers.
Leveraged CRM tools and market analysis to increase sales by 20%.
Optimised CRM processes to enhance customer experience, reducing wait times by 25%.
Consistently exceeded KPIs in a high-traffic environment.
Managed online transactions and daily cash reconciliations to ensure compliance.
Provided excellent customer service in a high-paced hospitality environment.
Multitasked efficiently while maintaining professionalism and energy.
Managed, trained, and monitored staff when needed to optimise standards and sales.
Exceeded daily targets through exceptional product knowledge and enthusiasm.
Ensured safety and security of fans while enhancing the match-day experience.
Mediated conflicts using NVQ-trained communication and conflict resolution skills.
Monitored crowd behaviour, preventing incidents proactively.
Followed all safety protocols and incident escalation procedures.
Learned payroll systems and improved process efficiency through creativity.
Organised and filed correspondence in chronological order.
Built financial reports and profit/loss sheets using Excel formulas.
Shadowed chartered accountants and assisted with client accounts.
